title: Sample statistics that change after multiplying

content.description: Consider a data set of positive values, at least two of which are not equal. Which of the following sample statistics will be changed when each value in this data set is multiplied by a constant whose absolute value is greater than 1?
content.question: The meanThe medianThe standard deviation

unit.text: 4: Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Calculate summary statistics, relative positions of points within a distribution, correlation, and predicted response.
